vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.deposit (patch_0.sol#16-21):
	External calls:
	- transferLog.addMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_0.sol#19)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_0.sol#20)
